document_data.name: Clan of the Broken Bones
document_data.mainbody: The '''Broken Bones clan''' was a group of raiding [[goblin]]s who operated out of the forests in [[Shadowdale]] around [[1369 DR]]. They would attack travelers in the area with hit-and-run tactics at night, ambushing from underbrush. The goblins were ultimately cowards and would retreat from battles if their forces dropped beneath half.
